resource.name: systems_engineering_representation
resource.keywords: resource, state-based behaviour, function-based behaviour, behaviour, systems engineering

purpose.p: The systems_engineering_representation identifies the representation concepts required by the Systems Engineering discipline.

inscope.li: definition of state-based behaviour representation concepts;
definition of function-based behaviour representation concepts;
definition of description text representation concepts.

schema.name: systems_engineering_representation_schema
schema.introduction: The systems_engineering_representation_schema represents concepts required in the Systems Engineering discipline for representations of artifacts consumed and produced by that discipline.

fund_cons.p: The Systems Engineering discipline requires complex representations. This part of ISO 10303 extends the simple representation mechanisms in other parts of ISO 10303 to enable items that are not direct subtypes of representation to be used as, or as part of, representations.
